alert.note: Alert for Albemarle; Augusta; City of Harrisonburg; City of Waynesboro; Greene; Nelson; Page; Rockingham; Shenandoah (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 28 at 7:17PM EDT until July 28 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EDT FOR NELSON...SOUTHERN SHENANDOAH...SOUTHEASTERN ROCKINGHAM... SOUTHWESTERN PAGE...WESTERN ALBEMARLE...WESTERN GREENE...AND SOUTHEASTERN AUGUSTA COUNTIES...THE CITY OF WAYNESBORO AND THE EAST CENTRAL CITY OF HARRISONBURG... At 716 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles east of Timberville to near Clifford, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Law enforcement. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Waynesboro, Stuarts Draft, Crozet, Grottoes, Shenandoah, Massanutten, Crimora, Stanley, Sherando, Shipman, Schuyler, Free Union, Wintergreen, Afton, Big Meadows, Fishersville, Elkton, Weyers Cave, New Market and Lyndhurst. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.

area.areaDesc: Albemarle; Augusta; City of Harrisonburg; City of Waynesboro; Greene; Nelson; Page; Rockingham; Shenandoah
